document_data.name: Romsan Kal
document_data.mainbody: '''Romsan Kal''' was a scarred innkeeper in [[Twilight Marsh]] near [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Romsan was a jovial individual. He constantly changed the story of how he acquired his scars, from escaping from an [[illithid]] to a fight with a [[dragon]]. He knew all adventurers' negotiating ploys and laughed if someone tried to use them on him.
document_data.Activities: Romsan was the [[Amn]]ian manager of the [[Crossing Inn]], the most famous inn near [[Trank River]] on the road to Phlan.{{Cite adventurers league/Drums in the Marsh|7}}
